short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect-My-Files extension show your public links in your google drive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage secure access to cloud documents with Protect-My-Files
Manage your Google Drive and OneDrive data on the same platform
With Protect-My-Files you can:
1. Solve the security problem of your data:
- find public files before they appear on the Internet
- Find users to whom you gave access and forgot about them
2. Work with an unlimited number of accounts in the "single window" mode
3. Work with all types of files in one application
4. Create teams or projects in the app's interface and share them with the team: Protect-My-Files allows a company to combine employees and cloud documents in one app
And much moreâ€¦
